name: Fritz Chess
description:
Fritz Chess is the quintessential version of the classic boardgame and
offers a fun and engrossing challenge to players of all levels. Ratchet
up the fun with an assortment of original game modes.

Experts will hunker down to the ultimate strategic battle and improve
their ELO ranking while kids and families will use the robust help
system to learn and develop skills in a thoroughly intuitive way.

With a compelling mix of classic chess, unique modes of play,
multiplayer and more, Fritz is the one chess game that you cannot afford
to live without.
